title: Neuroscience-Based Education for Developing Cognitive Empathy and Social Science Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental neuroscience concepts and social issue analysis
context.additional_context: Course for in-service professionals to analyze neuroscience-based social issues and cultivate cognitive empathy skills. Designed for mobile environments with smartphone-only accessibility

learning_goals: Analyze ethical dilemmas posed by neuroscience technologies from three or more perspectives
Apply cognitive empathy strategies that consider the values of others in SSI (Socio-Scientific Issues) discussions
Utilize a framework to structure complex social problems by separating emotional responses from cognitive thinking
Propose prototypes to improve real-world cases through Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
